summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: BERON 18" Middle Length Curly Wavy Wig Syntehtic Fiber Halloween Cosplay Costume Party Natural Wigs with Wig Cap (Light Purple) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: BERON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Brand': 'BERON', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.91 x 7.83 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Review Text: Such a lovely looking wig, the color is perfect and it actually feels pretty full, fuller then some of my other wigs, I'm happy with it! Review Title: Love it looks great! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly… Review Date: 2020/09/28 Store: Biutee Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: Reading more on this type of gel, it seems the problem I had with gel are more likely to be user error on my part from this being my first use of such materiel and that I may not have added enough or used too much alcohol.
This also doesn't seem like there's all that much, my guess is it's good for 2-3 sets of nails, but Ive only used this once so I can't confirm that.

I did use alcohol on my nails, buff then add a base coat before putting them into nail forms, yet it seems the majority of these lifted up, last night I broke two by searching for things in the fridge, this morning I woke up to 2 more broken, I have now broken another one.
The breaks are happening on the ones that were already lifted, the ones that seemed to have actually layer down flat on my nails.

I'll try again at a later date and maybe update my review then. Right now I feel thisdoes probably work right if you have the proper experience of how to use stuff like this. Review Title: It's not working for me so far Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 3 Packs Braiding Hair Extensions 165G Jumbo Braiding Hair High Temperature Synthetic Fiber Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions ( Rose Red) Review Date: 2020/09/30 Store: UHair Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'UHair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'} Review Text: These looks great and super long, will be perfect for my plan to use these as filler for a Jessie wig I'm going to try to construct!
Also came with a wide scrunchy I ended up using as a bracelet. Review Title: Looks great, excited to us them! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 7pcs Pearl Hair Clips Large Hair Clips Pins Barrette Ties Hair Headwear Barrette for Party Wedding Daily, Gift for Girls and Women Review Date: 2020/11/16 Store: MEETWIN Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '723668014119'} Review Text: Really nice set of barettes and Bobby pins, look great!

All the pearls seem to be what I'd called sewn on, making them give me the impression they'll be better quality and longer longer over say super glue.
All in all happy with these for sure! Review Title: Really pretty set of hair accesories! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: INH Semi Permanent Hair Color Share Bear Purple, Color Depositing Conditioner, Temporary Hair Dye, Tint Conditioning Hair Mask, Safe, Purple Hair Dye - 6oz Review Date: 2021/08/09 Store: INH Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Brand': 'INH', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Unit Count': '6.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2.5 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'UPC': '810073150669'} Review Text: Update:
Ended up lighting my hair again and trying again to see if that would improve how well it showed up.
The purple did show up a lot better this time. I think the weirdest thing about this color is the closer to the roots it was the more pink in color it was. (The difference was a lot more noticable in person.)
I've had it in my hair about a month now and it's still hanging on. The blurred face picture is how it faded in that time.
I prefer INH's non-care bears hair color, feel it gives you the result you expect, this one you really need white hair for best results, because even light blonde gets you more of a pinkish purple.

-----
Review before
-----
My natural hair is close to the 'Caramel' on their color chart, and this really didn't show up at all for me when I tested it that way.
So I did go and bleach my hair, my blonde is now the color of 'Champagne Blonde' via the color chart (It looks darker in the photo I took of it for some reason.) But it's showing up more like the color they say it should look like for Caramel hair.

It...really just feels like it's tinting my hair vs really coloring it?
In my image you'll maybe see Purple-Pink-Blonde stripes on the pulled down section hopefully.
The pink stripe in the center is the purple hair dye after 5 days of putting it on my hair. (I never rinsed it after putting it on, and I've only brushed water through my hair once.)

I did also test this on my dog, I looked at the ingredients and compared them to Arctic fox which was a brand known to be safe on dogs, looked to be the same exact ingredients, so I tried it out assuming it should be relatively safe. (But I didn't let it touch her skin just in case.)
It showed up quite well on her white fur and lasted about 3 weeks?
So that made me feel like your hair really needs to be pretty light for it to really show in a way that's noticably purple I feel?
I'm not sure I like the look of the color on my test area enough to dye my whole hair with it, but wonder if it'd look better that way then just in a test area. Review Title: I wouldn't go by their color chart. Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

I did also test this on my dog, I looked at the ingredients and compared them to Arctic fox which was a brand known to be safe on dogs, looked to be the same exact ingredients, so I tried it out assuming it should be relatively safe. (But I didn't let it touch her skin just in case.)

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: BERON 18" Middle Length Curly Wavy Wig Syntehtic Fiber Halloween Cosplay Costume Party Natural Wigs with Wig Cap (Light Purple) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: BERON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Brand': 'BERON', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.91 x 7.83 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Review Text: Such a lovely looking wig, the color is perfect and it actually feels pretty full, fuller then some of my other wigs, I'm happy with it! Ended up lighting my hair again and trying again to see if that would improve how well it showed up.
The purple did show up a lot better this time. I think the weirdest thing about this color is the closer to the roots it was the more pink in color it was. (The difference was a lot more noticable in person.)
I've had it in my hair about a month now and it's still hanging on. The blurred face picture is how it faded in that time.
I prefer INH's non-care bears hair color, feel it gives you the result you expect, this one you really need white hair for best results, because even light blonde gets you more of a pinkish purple.

-----
Review before
-----
My natural hair is close to the 'Caramel' on their color chart, and this really didn't show up at all for me when I tested it that way.
So I did go and bleach my hair, my blonde is now the color of 'Champagne Blonde' via the color chart (It looks darker in the photo I took of it for some reason.) But it's showing up more like the color they say it should look like for Caramel hair.

It...really just feels like it's tinting my hair vs really coloring it?
In my image you'll maybe see Purple-Pink-Blonde stripes on the pulled down section hopefully.
The pink stripe in the center is the purple hair dye after 5 days of putting it on my hair. (I never rinsed it after putting it on, and I've only brushed water through my hair once.)

I did also test this on my dog, I looked at the ingredients and compared them to Arctic fox which was a brand known to be safe on dogs, looked to be the same exact ingredients, so I tried it out assuming it should be relatively safe. (But I didn't let it touch her skin just in case.)
It showed up quite well on her white fur and lasted about 3 weeks?
So that made me feel like your hair really needs to be pretty light for it to really show in a way that's noticably purple I feel?
I'm not sure I like the look of the color on my test area enough to dye my whole hair with it, but wonder if it'd look better that way then just in a test area. Review Title: I wouldn't go by their color chart. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual's purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards vibrant fashion accessories and beauty products, particularly with an emphasis on colorful, expressive options such as wigs, hair color, and hair extensions. The consistent high ratings (4.0+) for items like wigs and hair accessories indicate a preference for aesthetics and visual appeal, particularly in bold colors and styles. Sentiments highlight satisfaction with product appearance and quality, as seen in comments about design and durability.

However, there is a variability in experience, particularly with nail products, which suggests a learning curve or varied satisfaction levels in functional performance rather than mere aesthetics. The individual appears somewhat sensitive to user experience and application techniques.

Quality appears prioritized, especially with a preference for materials described as full and durable, while price sensitivity may indicate a tolerance for modest price points, but not luxury items. There’s a tendency towards products that offer DIY potential, suggesting a preference for creative engagement and personalization.

Overall, core preferences center around vibrant and high-quality fashion and beauty items, with a clear inclination for products facilitating self-expression and creativity while valuing overall quality and aesthetic appeal.

target_interaction.title: Nice!
target_interaction.text:
These are really nice for synthetic extensions, some of the most convincing synthetic extensions I've come across!
Normally measure to confirm the length, unfortunately don't have one on hand at this time.
target_interaction.title_meta: Isaic Invisible Wire Hair Extension with Transparent Wire Headband Adjustable Size 4 Secure Clips Long straight Synthetic Hairpiece for Women （24Inch,Medium Brown with Ash Blonde)

videos.title: These extensions have a very pretty color and apply nicely.
